title: [Marco Polo and the red dragon : publicity kit and animation cells]
brief_description: Publicity kit for the production Marco Polo and the red dragon (1972), including 1 B&W Still (Large), 1 B&W Transparency (Large), 3 Colour Transparencies (Large), 1 Sequence of animation cells (4 gel overlays with 1 blue backing)
